name: Jungle Monkey (itch) (Fura-i)
description:
You are a monkey tail named Bouboune, and you want to spend your best day of the relax with your friends. In this 2.5D action platformer developed by 2 programmers and 4 designers, you will explore a dense jungle to find friends and secrets.  

  Use your tail as a grapnel to climb green surfaces, swing, jump, and hit wild animals. The more you master your tail, the speeder is your ascension.  Find enough secrets to unlock the ultimate challenge!

  Be sure to observe the backstage to avoid jaguar claws or to find secret paths.

The journey has just begun!
